s2.message: Having problems with Adblock Plus? Let us know about them so that we can improve your experience. Download Adblock Plus for Chrome and other platforms here.

s5.message: Please consider the following points before filing your bug report.

s6.message: Some issues aren't Adblock Plus bugs

s7.message: An advertisement isn't blocked: this is a filters issue, please report it by other means.

s8.message: A website doesn't work correctly and temporarily disabling Adblock Plus on this site fixes the issue: this is a filters issue, please report it by other means.

s9.message: An issue happens before Adblock Plus is installed or persists if it is uninstalled: you have to look elsewhere for an explanation.

s10.message: In particular, if Adblock Plus fails to install and you are using a supported browser then you are facing a browser issue and the general troubleshooting instructions apply. If not using Firefox, see: Chrome, Opera, Safari, Internet Explorer

s12.message: You can get support and report your issue in the forum.

s13.message: Your bug report should contain all necessary information to reproduce it:

s14.message: Adblock Plus version, which browser you are using (with version number), which operating system is used

s15.message: Any configuration details that might be relevant (filter lists used, own filters if any, unusual browser configuration, other extensions)

s16.message: Exact description of the steps that need to be followed to see the bug

s17.message: Exact description of what happens and what you think is wrong

s18.message: My bug report is no longer there, what happened?

s19.message: You came back and your bug report is no longer there?

s20.message: Maybe the moderators changed the title to make it more meaningful.
